import React, { useState, useEffect, useSyncExternalStore} from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col, Image, Button, Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import { listProgramDetails } from '../actions/programActions' function ProgramsScreen({ match }) { const program_id = useParams(); const dispatch = useDispatch() const programDetails = useSelector(state => state.programDetails) const { loading, error, program} = programDetails useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProgramDetails(program_id.id)) }, []) return (
{
loading ?

Loading...

: error ?

{error}

: Go Back
}

{program.name}

 {program.description} Date: {program.date} Age: {program.ageGroup} Fees: {program.fees} KD
) } export default ProgramsScreen
